section.p: 'I need one more ingredient before I can activate the golem,' says Hemmuwa silkily. 'To be precise, a human heart! Come to think of it, yours will be perfect, and it'll save me the payment for the ore!'
He steps toward you, readying a spell.

choices.choice: Try to talk him out of it
Counter with a spell of your own
Draw your weapon and attack him
